name: Magical Scholastics
summary: While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past.
description:
While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past. You gain detect magic, guidance, and read aura as occult innate cantrips.Magical Scholastics Leads To...

Greater Magical ScholasticsTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
